LAME Frontend

Fixed Bitrate  
bitrate (-b) high quality (-h)
  fast (no noise shaping)
   
Variable Bitrate  
variable bitrate (-v) VBR quality (-V)
maximum bitrate (-B) enforce min. bitrate (-F)
   
General  
mode (-m) disable all filters (-k)
copyrighted (-c) non-original (-o)
   
ID3-Tag  
title (--tt) artist (--ta)
album (--tl) year (--ty) track (--tn)
comment (--tc) genre (--tg)
